title: (x) Gill Sans-like sans on Adobe Flash showcase site - Myriad {Lex}
content:
Hello all,

I would love any help trying to identify the font used on and around the navigation on this web page.

At first i thought it was a Gill Sans but the letters are not exactly right.

Any help is much appreciated

see link below:

[http://bd-la.com/fontid/1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306024105/http:/bd-la.com/fontid/1.jpg "http://bd-la.com/fontid/1.jpg")

Many thanks,

J

 [‹ Cursive font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306024105/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42780 "Go to previous forum topic") [Love this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306024105/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42776 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jaylane310

comments.content:
Since it’s Adobe, I think it might be Myriad.

- Lex

I would agree with Myriad. Also it’s “Gill” not “Gil”

[http://typophile.com/node/12627](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306024105/http:/typophile.com/node/12627 "http://typophile.com/node/12627")?

YOU GUYS ROCK! Thank you!

J
Jay, what is this site? URL?

Hey Tiffany,

I don’t think the site is live anymore. I posted up an old screenshot

J
